resources.string:
One finger tap: Left-click
Two finger tap: Right-click
Two finger drag: Scroll
Long press: Drag

Welcome to Web Launcher! To finish the setup process, visit http://avidandrew.com/weblauncher on your computer to install and configure the Viewer. Then, once the viewer is online, click the WOL (power) icon above, add the hostname of the Viewer, and it will be added to the list. If your Viewer does not support WOL, add it to the list and you will still be able to use it after manually powering it on.
IP: leave blank to auto-discover if host is on
Mac: leave blank to auto-discover if host is on
Auto-discover of IP/MAC failed - is the host on?

WebLauncher is an application for launching and controlling webpages on a remote computer. For more information, see avidandrew.com/weblauncher.
This app uses code from other open-source apps: SimpleComputerRemote and Simple Wake On LanCopyright 2018 Maxim Belyaev(NFS_MONSTR)
